metadata.name: STRAF Skill Runner
metadata.shortDescription: Intelligent STRAF skill executor with autonomous parameter gathering and execution
metadata.description: Automatically analyze OLAF skill input requirements, intelligently gather required parameters from workspace context or user input, and execute skills via STRAF agent in fully autonomous spawned mode
objectives: Analyze skill requirements and input parameters
Intelligently gather parameters from workspace context
Execute skills autonomously via STRAF agent
Handle spawned mode execution without manual prompts
Provide execution results and error handling
metadata.author: OLAF Framework

technical_requirements.tool_dependency: STRAF agent framework, AWS Bedrock access
